title: Model Infrastructure
description: Cross-platform cache directory, model download with progress indication, ONNX model loading via ort

title: VAE Encode/Decode
description: Load VAE encoder ONNX model, encode image to latent (1x4x64x64 for 512px), load VAE decoder ONNX model, decode latent to image

title: Add classifier-free guidance parameter to Config
description: Add guidance_scale parameter (3.0-6.0 range) to pipeline config based on research findings

title: Revert to unconditional-only diffusion
description: Remove conditional prediction until we have proper CLIP text encoder. Use only unconditional (empty embeddings) like original code but with optimized parameters from research.

title: Investigate proper DiffPure noise scheduling
description: Current strength parameter destroys images. Research mentions 0.15-0.3 but this refers to ComfyUI denoising strength, not timestep-based img2img strength. Need to implement proper DiffPure noise scheduling.

title: Project Setup
description: Initialize Cargo project, configure Cargo.toml with dependencies, set up error types with thiserror, create module structure

title: CLI Integration
description: Clap argument parsing, progress bars with indicatif, cross-platform path handling, device selection (CPU/CUDA/DirectML)

title: Add guidance_scale CLI argument
description: Add --guidance-scale argument to CLI with default value in the 3-6 range

title: Implement classifier-free guidance in UNet predictions
description: Modify predict_noise to compute both conditional and unconditional predictions, then blend using guidance scale

title: Diffusion Pipeline
description: Load UNet ONNX model, implement noise scheduler (DDIM), denoising loop with configurable steps, strength parameter for noise level

title: Testing and Cross-Platform
description: Unit tests for each module, integration test with sample image, test on Windows and WSL Fedora

title: Implement classifier-free guidance in predict_noise
description: Compute both conditional and unconditional noise predictions, blend using: noise_pred = unconditional + guidance_scale * (conditional - unconditional)

title: Add classifier-free guidance to Config
description: Add guidance_scale parameter (default 5.0, range 3.0-6.0) to Config struct based on research findings for optimal SynthID removal

title: Image I/O Module
description: Load images (PNG, JPEG, WebP), convert to/from ndarray tensor format, save with configurable quality

title: Add --guidance-scale CLI argument
description: Add CLI argument for guidance_scale with default value of 5.0

title: CRITICAL: Remove broken CFG implementation
description: Current CFG uses fake embeddings (0.1 values). Research shows we need proper CLIP text encoder or should disable CFG entirely. Using invalid embeddings is worse than no CFG.
